text: A kto ne vnyal poslanniku Allakha, tot ne smozhet spastis' ot Allakha, dazhe yesli on userdno budet iskat' ubezhishche na zemle. I net dlya nego pomimo Allakha zashchitnikov, kotoryye izbavyat yego ot nakazaniya Allakha. Te, kotoryye otkazalis' vnyat' poslanniku Allakha, v zameshatel'stve i yavno daleki ot istiny
